title: Apple's M4 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro with 48GB RAM plunges to $2,569, record low price
description: An exclusive deal discounts the upgraded M4 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro by a staggering $330, with free 2-day shipping in time for the holidays.Save $330 on a premium 16-inch MacBook Pro 2024 with M4 Pro.The lowest price on record is available exclusively for AppleInsider readers, with Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo dropping the Space Black MacBook Pro 16-inch with 48GB RAM and 512GB storage down to $2,569. This reflects a $330 discount off retail on the M4 Pro model with 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU and is the lowest price available on this configuration per our 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.Save $330 at B&H Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: An exclusive deal discounts the upgraded M4 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro by a staggering $330, with free 2-day shipping in time for the holidays.
text: Save $330 on a premium 16-inch MacBook Pro 2024 with M4 Pro. An exclusive deal discounts the upgraded M4 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro by a staggering $330, with free 2-day shipping in time for the holidays. The lowest price on record is available exclusively for AppleInsider readers, with Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo dropping the Space Black MacBook Pro 16-inch with 48GB RAM and 512GB storage down to $2,569. This reflects a $330 discount off retail on the M4 Pro model with 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU and is the lowest price available on this configuration per our 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide. You must click through this special pricing link from a laptop or desktop computer to activate the $2,569 price. We're sorry, but the deal cannot be activated through the B&H or AppleInsider apps at this time. In addition to the savings on the laptop itself, B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. That means you can have a new MacBook Pro wrapped and ready for gift-giving just in time for the holidays. Payboo cardholders can further extend to the savings with one of the card's perks — an instant sales tax refund in select states or special financing. If you're looking for the lowest price on a MacBook period, B&H is also marking down the 14-inch MacBook Pro with last year's M3 chip to $1,349. You can pick it up through this activation link using the above instructions, as well as via our 14-inch MacBook Pro M3 Price Guide.
html:
Save $330 on a premium 16-inch MacBook Pro 2024 with M4 Pro.

An exclusive deal discounts the upgraded M4 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro by a staggering $330, with free 2-day shipping in time for the holidays.

The lowest price on record is available exclusively for AppleInsider readers, with Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo dropping the Space Black MacBook Pro 16-inch with 48GB RAM and 512GB storage down to $2,569. This reflects a $330 discount off retail on the M4 Pro model with 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU and is the lowest price available on this configuration per our 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.

You must click through this special pricing link from a laptop or desktop computer to activate the $2,569 price. We're sorry, but the deal cannot be activated through the B&H or AppleInsider apps at this time.

In addition to the savings on the laptop itself, B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. That means you can have a new MacBook Pro wrapped and ready for gift-giving just in time for the holidays. Payboo cardholders can further extend to the savings with one of the card's perks — an instant sales tax refund in select states or special financing.

If you're looking for the lowest price on a MacBook period, B&H is also marking down the 14-inch MacBook Pro with last year's M3 chip to $1,349. You can pick it up through this activation link using the above instructions, as well as via our 14-inch MacBook Pro M3 Price Guide.
